response.overview: A year after Sonny Colbrelli was forced into retirement following a shocking heart attack, the Italian opens the doors to his home for an exclusive and candid insight into his life after racing.  In 2021, Colbrelli had enjoyed the greatest season of his life. Winning huge races like Paris-Roubaix and the European championships, he was a cycling superstar.  But, this hot streak was short-lived. Just six months after that famous Roubaix win, the Bahrain Victorious riderâ€™s heart stopped at a race. He was lucky to survive.  Colbrelli tried to continue racing, but, ultimately, decided not to take the risk. His career was stopped at its peak. One year later, he remains at a crossroads, unsure of what to do next, and still heartbroken by the loss of his racing life.
response.title: Heartbreak: Sonny Colbrelli
